title: About us
content: Andrea Vitaletti - Associate Professor at La Sapienza Marco Zecchini - Ph.D. student at La Sapienza Giammarco D’Alessandro - Student at La Sapienza Luca Gioffr√® - Student at La Sapienza Davide - Student at La Sapienza

title: DLT Group - Sapienza
content:
DLT Group - Sapienza The DLT group of ‘La Sapienza’ is a research and development group of blockchain technologies based at the Department of Automatic and Management Informatics Engineering - Antonio Ruberti.
Currently we are employed in the research of solutions with DLT technologies for the management of copyright.
